books.author: Gambardella, Matthew
books.title: XML Developer's Guide
books.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

books.author: Ralls, Kim
books.title: Midnight Rain
books.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

books.author: Corets, Eva
books.title: Maeve Ascendant
books.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

books.author: Corets, Eva
books.title: Oberon's Legacy
books.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

books.author: Galos, Mike
books.title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
books.description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
